original_text: He says, ‘Men might come in the night to take away what is yours. (Oh! What a very bad thing will happen to you!) But they would not take everything. If people came to take fruit from your trees, they would leave some fruit on the tree. He says, ‘Men might come in the night to take away what is yours. (Oh! What a very bad thing will happen to you!) But they would not take everything. If people came to take fruit from your trees, they would leave some fruit on the tree. He says,
korean_text: 혹시 도둑이 네게 이르렀으며 강도가 밤중에 네게 이르렀을지라도 만족할 만큼 훔치면 그치지 아니하였겠느냐 혹시 포도를 따는 자가 네게 이르렀을지라도 그것을 얼마쯤 남기지 아니하였겠느냐 네가 어찌 그리 망하였는고

sentences.original_text: Men might come in the night
to take away what is yours.
But they would not take everything.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 모든 것을 가져가지는 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: If people came to take fruit
